org.daisy.pipeline.script

Class Script

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.script.Script
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    XProcScript

    public abstract class Script
extends Object
    Script description. Contains scripts metadata and descriptions of inputs, outputs and options.
